page.title: 15Wellsmead Schools,Bletchley
page.content: I first started Wellsmead First School when I was five.I learned to read,write and count.There were guinea pigs,rabbits and gerbils.There were also fish and frogs in the pond.I used to like playing with the sand and the water bowls.There are eight classes altogether and a dining room. Wellsmead Middle School has nine classes.Each class shares a computer. We have a video,electric organs and many other musical instruments.Our Library is well stocked with all sorts of books.We are very lucky,we have a large grass playing field as well as a hard playground and many courtyards.We also have a swimming pool,greenhouse, overhead projector and a T.V. room which is also used as a music room.We have an art room where a kiln is used for firing pottery.
